text: Actually very happy to read this <https://www.xda-developers.com/google-is-working-on-an-always-on-ambient-display-mode-for-the-pixel/>

attachments.title: Google is working on an Always On Ambient Display Mode for the Pixel
attachments.text: Google is working to bring an always on Ambient Display mode to the Google Pixel devices, according to a teardown of the SystemUI APK file.
attachments.fallback: xda-developers: Google is working on an Always On Ambient Display Mode for the Pixel
